name: Car Runner (xor_jsensurreal)
description:
A car racing prototype with a temple runner style.

Keyboard Control
Left - A or Left Arrow
Right - D or Right Arrow

Joystick Control
Drag Left or Right

Updates
v0.0.3
- Added sound effects
v0.0.2
- Added lap tracker
v0.0.1
- Randomized obstacles
- Increased speed with every lap
